textBox.richText: This is it! The start of fourth generation hacking! After much work I have finally figured out how to edit text in it... It was kind of complicated too. Maybe I’ll get a tutorial up soon, but I don’t know. The actual content of this video is pretty much you’d expect from an introduction hack. The two screens do pan when necessary, although I can’t imagine that will be required in areas that aren’t The Intro. Map editing coming soon? No clue, but perhaps Black and White if the process is similar enough...
